name: places/ChIJD2MvfI9ZwokR8-HTs6tnpos
formattedAddress: 280 Mulberry St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 280 Mulberry St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: I went Sunday for a scalp treatment and blow dry. This was my first time receiving this type of service. Lynn was my stylist that day, and I could not be more satisfied!! She made me feel very comfortable and relaxed. She even offered me a towel for my legs since I was wearing a shorter outfit which I appreciated as I didn’t have to worry about having to constantly check to see if I needed to readjust myself. She was amazing at explaining every step of the process and the reasoning behind it. My scalp felt so clean, moisturized, and light. I’ve already recommended her to my family members and friends. I cannot wait to come back!!

originalText.text: I’ve been coming for 2 years regularly for haircuts, color, and straightening with Zen, and he is an expert of taking the hairstyles I want and making them work for my hair!! It’s always a beautiful and clean job. Please book your next appointment with Nagi Hair — the staff are very kind and attentive to the detail and health of your hair ☺️.

text.text: I’ve been coming for 2 years regularly for haircuts, color, and straightening with Zen, and he is an expert of taking the hairstyles I want and making them work for my hair!! originalText.text: Kozue is amazing! I went in for a scalp treatment/cut/style and she was very thorough in explaining the potential causes and solutions for my hair concerns. There is a huge focus on the overall quality and health of the hair. My hair and scalp feels so much healthier now. She also suggested styles that best fit me and how to get more volume which was one of my hair concerns. Highly recommend, will be coming back for my next treatment.

text.text: Kozue is amazing! I went in for a scalp treatment/cut/style and she was very thorough in explaining the potential causes and solutions for my hair concerns. There is a huge focus on the overall quality and health of the hair. My hair and scalp feels so much healthier now. She also suggested styles that best fit me and how to get more volume which was one of my hair concerns. Highly recommend, will be coming back for my next treatment.

originalText.text:
Zen is one of the best hair stylists I’ve ever encountered. Everyone’s hair is different and needs its own unique attention. Before anything else, Zen sits me down and takes his time learning what I want and what my hair will require for the perfect cut. It’s been a challenge finding a hairdresser who can successfully cut and shape a medium length(long-ish) men’s hair style. Zen, however, does it beautifully and for an amazing price!

The shop is very intimate. White washed wood, complimentary lighting, and a staff that makes every customer feel special. As I get my haircut, I watch the other hairdressers at work. The skill level of the staff is remarkable!
They make everyone look fabulous… like, stop traffic fabulous! In fact, that’s how I found out about this place. Stopped a guy on the street who had a fantastic haircut and he directed me to Nagi Hair.

Whether it be with Zen or any member of the Nagi Hair staff, I promise, you will not regret going to this place. THEY’RE THE BEST!!

originalText.text: Definitely want to be fair with my review. I waited 3 months (5/28) to see if there was any positive change to my hair but unfortunately no. I did a scalp treatment and a haircut. It substantially dried my hair after I did it. She also looked confused on how to give layers, so I have very uneven layers. I’m going to go to another salon to see how they can salvage my hair but I’m really sad for my hair after this experience. Just be careful to not get your hair thinned out too much and to ensure the products don’t dry your hair out. Best of luck!
